exec: const mod = (base, div) => Math.round(base - Math.floor(base / div) * div)
let d1 = n.reduce((total, number, index) => (total + (number * (10 - index))), 0)
let d2 = (d1 * 2) + n.reduce((total, number, index) => (total + (number * (11 - index))), 0)
